sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row no-gutters>
      <v-col v-for="n in this.numpost" :key="n">
        <BlogPost
          :title="this.titles[n - 1]"
          :date="this.dates[n - 1]"
          :contents="this.text[n - 1]"
        />
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import BlogPost from "./BlogPost.vue";
export default {
  name: "BlogGridLoad",

  data: () => ({
    numpost: 3,
    titles: ["A day in the park", "Chickens laying eggs", "I like turtles"],
    dates: ["08.06.2023", "04.06.2023", "03.06.2023"],
    text: [
      "Amongst the chickens were eggs which gave rise to more chickens. Amongst the newborn chicks were fluffy amongi from the skeld who enjoyed playing with them.",
      "Amongst the chickens were eggs which gave rise to more chickens. Amongst the newborn chicks were fluffy amongi from the skeld who enjoyed playing with them.",
      "Amongst the chickens were eggs which gave rise to more chickens.  Amongst the newborn chicks were fluffy amongi from the skeld who enjoyed playing with them.",
    ],
  }),
  methods: {},
  components: {
    BlogPost,
  },
  mounted() {
    fetch("http://localhost:3000/")
      .then((response) => {
        console.log(response[0]);
      })
      .catch((error) => {
        console.log(error);
        // handle the error
      });
  },
};
</script>
